messages.content: Write a formal short message as if you're talking to a family but you're talking to a friend. The context is about a photo that you and your friend siena was in.

Dear family,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to share with you a photo that Siena and I were in together. It was such a fun moment and I'm glad we were able to capture it. Please let me know if you'd like to see the photo.

Best, [Your Name]
No, you're going to send this in a instagram message and make it more more formal.

Dear family,

I hope this message finds you well. I recently came across a photo that Siena and I were in together and I wanted to share it with you. It was a fun moment and I'm glad we were able to capture it.

Please let me know if you'd like to see the photo.

Best,
[Your Name]
No, she posted it in instagram and you're commenting on the post, a positive post of you, siena and your friends there.

Dear [Friend's Name],

I hope you're doing well! I just wanted to leave a comment on your recent post to let you know how much I enjoyed the photo of you, Siena, and our friends at the party. It was such a fun night and I'm glad we were all able to capture the memories.

Keep up the great work and I can't wait to see what the future holds for you.

Best, [Your Name]
Make it even more formal, imagine your talking to the president and even even shorter.

Dear [President's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I recently came across a photo that Siena and I were in together and I wanted to share it with you. It was a fun moment and I'm glad we were able to capture it.

Please let me know if you'd like to see the photo.

Best,
[Your Name]
BUt you're actually talking to siena.

Dear Siena,

I hope this message finds you well. I recently came across a photo that you and I were in together and I wanted to share it with you. It was a fun moment and I'm glad we were able to capture it.

Please let me know if you'd like to see the photo.

Best,
[Your Name]
